meaningMnemonic: When your <kanji>heart</kanji> is <kanji>relax</kanji>ed, how do you feel? What if this is after something startling happens? You would feel <vocabulary>relief</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>peace of mind</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
